// Pivot 0, 0
int left flipper[16] = {
	10, 19,
	73, 48,
	83, 48,
	84, 42,
	79, 36,
	17, 1,
	5, 2,
	1, 11
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float left flipper[16] = {
	0.116279f, 0.372549f,
	0.848837f, 0.941176f,
	0.965116f, 0.941176f,
	0.976744f, 0.823529f,
